Package FX.Model

Class SoundEffects

java.lang.Object
FX.Model.SoundEffects
public class SoundEffects
extends java.lang.Object
this class contains all the sound effects for the gameplay.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SoundEffects()
    this constructor is used to set all the sound effects into a variable for future reference.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ballCollisionRandomSound​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip soundEffect1, javafx.scene.media.AudioClip soundEffect2)
    this method is used to play a random sound effect when there is a collision from the ball.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getBallPlayerCollisionSound1()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the ball collides with the player paddle.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getBallPlayerCollisionSound2()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the ball collides with the player paddle.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getCementBrickCollisionSound()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the cement brick is getting collided.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getCementBrickDestroyedSound()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the cement brick is broken.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getClayBrickCollisionSound1()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the ball collides with the clay brick.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getClayBrickCollisionSound2()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the ball collides with the clay brick.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getGameWindowCollisionSound1()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the ball collides with the game window side.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getGameWindowCollisionSound2()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the ball collides with the game window side.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getLostSound()
    this method is used to get a defeat audio clip when the user failed to beat a level.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getSteelBrickCollisionSound1()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the steel brick gotten collided with the steel brick.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getSteelBrickCollisionSound2()
    this method is used to get the audio clip used when the steel brick gotten collided with the steel brick.
    javafx.scene.media.AudioClip getVictorySound()
    this method is used to get the victory audio clip when the user successfully beat a level.
    void playBrickSoundEffect​(Brick b)
    this method is used to play a sound effect when the brick collides with a brick.
    void setBallPlayerCollisionSound1​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip ballPlayerCollisionSound1)
    this method is used to set one of the audio clip for the player (paddle) ball collision.
    void setBallPlayerCollisionSound2​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip ballPlayerCollisionSound2)
    this method is used to set the other audio clip for the player (paddle) ball collision
    void setCementBrickCollisionSound​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip cementBrickCollisionSound)
    this method is used to set the cement brick collision between the ball and the cement brick.
    void setCementBrickDestroyedSound​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip cementBrickDestroyedSound)
    this method is used to set the breaking of the cement brick.
    void setClayBrickCollisionSound1​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip clayBrickCollisionSound1)
    this method is used to set one of the clay brick collision sound effect which is caused when the ball collides with the ball.
    void setClayBrickCollisionSound2​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip clayBrickCollisionSound2)
    this method is used to set the other clay brick collision sound effect which is caused when the ball collides with the ball.
    void setGameWindowCollisionSound1​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip gameWindowCollisionSound1)
    this method is used to set one of the audio clip used for window collision between the ball and the window.
    void setGameWindowCollisionSound2​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip gameWindowCollisionSound2)
    this method is used to set the other sound audio clip for the window collision between the ball and the window.
    void setLostSound​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip lostSound)
    this method is used to set the defeat sound effect when the player failed to beat a level.
    void setSteelBrickCollisionSound1​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip steelBrickCollisionSound1)
    this method is used to set the audio clip used for the collision between the steel brick or the reinforced steel brick and the ball.
    void setSteelBrickCollisionSound2​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip steelBrickCollisionSound2)
    this method is used to set the other steel brick sound collision between the ball and the steel brick
    void setVictorySound​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip victorySound)
    this method is used to set the victory sound effect when the player successfully beat a level.

    • ballCollisionRandomSound

      public void ballCollisionRandomSound​(javafx.scene.media.AudioClip soundEffect1, javafx.scene.media.AudioClip soundEffect2)
      this method is used to play a random sound effect when there is a collision from the ball.
      Parameters:
      soundEffect1 - this is one of the sound effect which might be selected based on a random probability
      soundEffect2 - this is the other sound effect which might be selected based on a random probability

    • playBrickSoundEffect

      public void playBrickSoundEffect​(Brick b)
      this method is used to play a sound effect when the brick collides with a brick.
      Parameters:
      b - this is the brick which is being collided by the ball.
